sections.title: 1. Data Controller
sections.content:
TalentQX is the data controller for your personal data under the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679 ("GDPR").

Data Controller: TalentQX Technology Inc.
Address: [Company Address]
Data Protection Officer: privacy@talentqx.com

sections.title: 2. Personal Data We Collect
sections.content:
We collect and process the following categories of personal data:

• Identity Data: Name, surname, job title
• Contact Data: Email address, phone number
• Professional Data: Company name, industry, employee count
• Assessment Data: Competency assessment responses and results
• Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, cookies
• Usage Data: How you interact with our services

sections.title: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
sections.content:
We process your personal data based on:

• Consent (Art. 6(1)(a)): For marketing communications and optional features
• Contract Performance (Art. 6(1)(b)): To provide our services
• Legitimate Interests (Art. 6(1)(f)): For service improvement, security, and analytics
• Legal Obligation (Art. 6(1)(c)): To comply with applicable laws

sections.title: 4. Purposes of Processing
sections.content:
Your personal data is processed for:

• Service delivery and account management
• Processing demo and contact requests
• Conducting competency assessments and generating reports
• Communication about our services
• Analytics and service improvement
• Security and fraud prevention
• Legal compliance

sections.title: 5. Data Retention
sections.content:
We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary:

• Contact inquiries: 2 years from last interaction
• Assessment data: 3 years from completion (or as agreed in contract)
• Marketing consent: Until withdrawn
• Legal records: As required by applicable law

After retention periods expire, data is securely deleted or anonymized.

sections.title: 6. International Transfers
sections.content:
Your data may be transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA). We ensure appropriate safeguards through:

• Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission
• Adequacy decisions where applicable
• Other lawful transfer mechanisms under GDPR

sections.title: 7. Your Rights
sections.content:
Under GDPR, you have the right to:

• Access: Obtain confirmation and a copy of your personal data
• Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
• Erasure: Request deletion of your data ("right to be forgotten")
• Restriction: Limit processing in certain circumstances
• Data Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
• Object: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
• Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent at any time without affecting prior processing
• Automated Decisions: Not be subject to solely automated decisions with legal effects

sections.title: 8. Data Security
sections.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data:

• Encryption in transit and at rest
• Access controls and authentication
• Regular security assessments
• Employee training on data protection
• Incident response procedures

sections.title: 9. Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies and similar technologies. Essential cookies are used for service functionality. Analytics and marketing cookies require your consent. You can manage preferences through our cookie settings.

sections.title: 10. Contact & Complaints
sections.content:
To exercise your rights or for privacy inquiries:

Email: privacy@talentqx.com

We will respond within 30 days. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local Data Protection Authority.

sections.title: 11. Changes to This Notice
sections.content: We may update this privacy notice periodically. Material changes will be communicated via email or website notice. The current version is always available on our website.
